#item+rem+i_qcc+is_zxxx+ix_codexfacto: urn:1603:44:101||/The _[1603:44:101] //Dictiōnāria basibus de scielus contrā persōnam// _is the group of dictionaries focused at individual level/@eng-Latn

`+/Dictiōnāria basibus dē sceleribus contrā ūnam commūnitātem ab rēctōribus/+` (literal English translation: _Basic dictionaries about crimes against one community by rulers_) contains basic (id est, not fully detailed) concepts about crimes against **one** community of humans because of their membership (de facto or perceived) to be part of the community by rulers (which are supposed to protect a reign which that community is part of). \n\nA more well known term to describe the concepts here could be _Crimes against humanity_, however both [[1603:44:101]] and [[1603:44:111]] intentionally avoid terminology in Latin based on the root term _human_ to avoid confusion while having freedom to be stricter.

#item+rem+i_mul+is_zyyy: //commūnitātēs generibus || different types of communities (inside the dictionary)//
ethnos || est circulus hominum qui ipsi inter se per ligamina identificant quae eos ab aliis circulis distinguunt
#item+rem+i_qcc+is_zxxx+ix_wikip7535: /#Nationality is redundant with use of ethnicity#/@eng-Latn

#item+rem+i_mul+is_zyyy: religio || sive res divinae est ordinata systematum opinionum, systematum culturae, cosmotheoriarumque congeries, quae humanitatem cum rebus sacris et aliquando moralitate coniungit
rassa || est discriptio sociologica humani generis e quibusdam notis externis natura instructis, sicut coloribus cutis.
//non commūnitātēs generibus || different types of NOT communities (used to avoid confusion)//
factio politica || est societas civilis quae pondus politicum intra gubernationem vel administratio digestanem adfectat, plerumque in certaminibus electoralibus certando
